subject: Olympic Games
Track and Field
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: A British man who shouted at Usain Bolt and threw a bottle on the track at the start of the men’s Olympic 100-meter final was found guilty of a public order offense.
snippet: A British man who shouted at Usain Bolt and threw a bottle on the track at the start of the men’s Olympic 100-meter final was found guilty of a public order offense.
